    Between Manuscripts and Digital Texts: Commentaries on Hadith Raʾs al-Jalut

    13 minute read :: Posted on September 30, 2020

    As digital historians and corpus curators, faced with the complex history of reception and transmission as well as the distinct approach to learning and authorship, attributing authors to premodern Islamicate texts and representing this complexity within our corpus metadata is often a challenging task.
